name: The Homecoming Exhibition
description:
Nako Baev is an award-winning 3D artist who has worked on various projects in the film and video game industry. His current exhibition focuses more on modern, minimal and restraint outlook giving the goal of this type of exhibition to showcase a number of pieces in a way that allows viewers to fully appreciate their beauty and simplicity.



The pieces themselves are characterized by clean lines, a limited color palette, and a focus on form and texture they feature abstract or minimalist compositions. The sculptures are made of materials such as Calacatta marble, Ekeberg marble, or limestone. Each piece would have ample space around it to allow viewers to appreciate it fully and to avoid distractions.
